title: Z
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''z''' is the command to zap a memorized [[spell]].
*Pressing '''Z''' is the command to zap a spell even when there is no monster to target in range. 

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''z''' represents various small [[undead]].
*'''Z''' represents various large [[undead]].
